title: MTGGoldfish
description:
Magic the Gathering decks, reviews and product openings! The official channel for MTGGoldfish. Visit us at http://www.mtggoldfish.com.

Upload schedule for Major Series:
Sunday: Meme or Dream? 
Monday: Budget Magic, MTGGoldfish Podcast
Tuesday: Arena Series with Crim
Wednesday: Against the Odds
Thursday: Arena Series with Crim
Friday: Much Abrew About Nothing
Saturday: Arena Series with Crim

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: Glacierwood Siege is the New Mill Tech?!
videos.description:
Glacierwood Siege rewards us every time we cast an instant or sorcery spell by milling our opponents for four cards! Let's see if the new enchantment can make standard mill even more fun to play!

Today's video is brough to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/single-scoop-glacierwood-siege-is-the-new-mill-tech
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/7015176#paper

◼ Purchase this deck (paper): http://mtg.fish/FVnAX
◼ Purchase this deck (Magic Online): http://mtg.fish/9hZFL
